description: Describes one or more transit gateway route table advertisements.

parameters.name: TransitGatewayRouteTableAnnouncementIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the transit gateway route tables that are being advertised. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters associated with the transit gateway policy table. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayRouteTableAnnouncements
nested_items.description: Describes the transit gateway route table announcement.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayRouteTableAnnouncementId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway route table announcement.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the core network for the transit gateway route table announcement.

nested_items.name: PeerTransitGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the peer transit gateway.

nested_items.name: PeerCoreNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the core network ID for the peer.

nested_items.name: PeeringAttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the peering attachment.

nested_items.name: AnnouncementDirection
nested_items.description: The direction for the route table announcement.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayRouteTableId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway route table.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the transit gateway announcement.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the transit gateway route table announcement was created.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The key-value pairs associated with the route table announcement.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next page of results.
